answers.answer: small amount of protein like skim milk cheese, nuts and plain yogourt with frozen fruits. As long as it isn't empty calories your fine. I eat 3 small meals and 3 snacks a day. If i'm still hungry i eat a small amount of food including protein and wait 30 min at least before eating again. I have gestational diabetes so i'm really disciplined!
same here I feel like I'm never fUll I'm eating really healthy but I Seem to be eating all the time
same here I feel like I'm never fUll I'm eating really healthy but I Seem to be eating all the time
spoon full off Apple cider vinegar curbs my sweet tooth.and appetite all around.i love vinegar tho.
Sometimes I use the apple cyder vinegar when I ate too much. I know it helps to break things down.  And yes, I try to eat healthy stuff.  Thank you ladies!

question: I'm 16 weeks 4 days, and my appetite is strong!  I mean, sometimes I feel like I want to eat all the time.  I don't want to over do it, though.  How do you ladies keep a balance?
title: Appetite
